channel.title: Make image appear when you select an option?
channel.description:
Alright, so I'm doing some modifications to Martin's not-so-pretty donation page that came with his auto-donate system. I want to make it when you select an item from the dropdown, an image of said item appears next to the box.
[code] <select name="prod"> <option value="1">Item</option> <option value="2">Item</option> <option value="3">Item</option> </select> [/code]
Note: conventions are obviously wrong :P
The name and value must stay what they are for the system to work how it is.
If you need more of the code or something, tell me.

item.title: Make image appear when you select an option?
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Just add a “change” event listener to the select, have another element with the image elements and hide them all each time they select something, then un-hide the selected one.
